text: Gordon F. Potter (November 26, 1906 - June 14, 1971) was a Canadian canoeist who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. In 1936 he and his partner Edward Deir finished tenth in the K-2 10000 m event. ==References== * Category:1906 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Canadian male canoeists Category:Canoeists at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic canoeists of Canada
title: Gordon Potter (canoeist)
